entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Onefour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:42 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Onefour AAFC 9:00 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023
Temperature: -8.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -8.9°C
Wind: NNE 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow near midnight. Blowing snow early this evening. Local blowing snow before morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023
